rules_text:
Reconnoiter–Exile a land card from your graveyard. [i](Exile a land card from your graveyard: Attach to target land you control; or unattach from a land. Reconnoiter only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)[/i]
Modified lands you control are 4/4 creatures in addition to their other types. [i](Attached permanents you control and counters are modifications.)[/i]
